Navigation Limit: Arabian Gulf (Excluding Iran and Iraq)and Gulf of Oman, including waters of UAE or hold covered at terms to be agreed by underwriters
Mother vessel: Institute Yacht Clauses CL 328 of 1.11.85 but clauses 5.1, 9.1.4, 10.2, 10.6, 10.10,11.6.2, 11.6.3 Clause19.3 deleted, speed boat clause 19 to apply
Institute Yacht Clause-Machinery Damage Extension clause (1-11-85/ Cl 332)
Institute Yacht Clauses CL 328 of 1.11.85 but clauses 5.1, 9.1.4, 10.1, 10.6, 11.6.3, 11.6.4, 19.2.1 & 19.3 deleted.
Agreed such boats and/or craft and/or tenders and/or jet skis covered whilst used in conjunction with or independently of parent vessel.
Including third party & passengers legal liability up to AED combined single limit any one accident or occurrence and in the annual aggregate in respect of bodily injury and property damage

Agreed hull, machinery, etc., valuation shall include boats, craft, gear, tenders, equipment, jet skis etc. agreed such boats and/or craft and/or tenders and/or jetskis covered whilst used in conjunction with or In respect of tenders/ small craft etc which are on board the mother vessel
Including liabilities to third party liability as per clauses limited up to AED any one accident or occurrence.

Noted and agreed that Clause 11.7, Water Skiers Liabilities is extended to include liability to and/or of users of Jet Skis, Wave runners or similar craft to the same limit each and every accident  limit of liability of AED
Including dropping off and falling overboard of Outboard Motor.

Institute Yacht Clauses Personal Effects Clause (01/11/85) Cl.331 up to AED extended to include personal effects belonging to the beneficial owner of the Assured and his family, warranted that any single article valued at AED.- or more to be specifically declared and valued
Uninsured Boaters coverage (as attached)
Cancelling Returns Only
Commercial towing and assistance clause
Mopeds to be covered whilst on board the vessel and/or her tenders including whilst loading and unloading or whilst parked alongside the vessel whilst berthed.
Cash on board clause up to USD or equivalent currency
Institute War and Strikes Clauses  Yachts  CL.329 (1/11/85) extended to include Piracy with H&M
Theft of equipment-USD including tenders, boats, jetskis and nautic toys etc-values included under section A

Uninsured boater coverge clause -uninsured boater wording with the termyacht deemed to include the vessels tenders, dinghies, waverunner, jet skis, windsurfers, sub aqua and any such similar items including whilst being towed by any such items

Brokers Claim Handling Clause : A loss notification received by the Insurance Broker will be deemed as a loss notification to Insurer. All communications flowing between the Insurer, Insured and the appointed Loss Surveyor should be channelized through the Broker, unless there is any unavoidable reasons compelling direct communications between the parties
